subject: Re: Order #SSN4301
description_text:
Thought that might have been the case! Thanks for sending the tracking information. Can I ask where its coming from and the expected delivery date? 

Kind regards
Nick Allitt



> On 2 Dec 2025, at 15:47, General and sales enquiries <service@simsonn.com> wrote:
> 
> ﻿
> Don't worry, you haven't received an order confirmation because you didn't fill in your email address. We've added this email address for you, and we'll send you a shipping notification tomorrow.
> 
> 
> 
> On Tue, Dec 2, 2025 23:43 PM Nicholas Allitt<nickallitt@icloud.com> wrote:
> Hi,
> 
> Placed an order this morning but haven’t received and email.
> 
> Just wanted to know if its actually in stock and when I should expect the dispatched and tracking information.
> 
> Can’t wait to use this wheel ha!
> 
> Kind regards
> Nick

conversations.body_text: Hi Nicholas Allitt,  Your package is expected to arrive around the 9th.
